title: Pilgrim

replies.body:
Man, I got total puzzled trying to determine who this guy was. Bloodshot eyes, Gangplank? A cigar, Graves? A hood, Talon? An OC? Now he's blue and disappearing - Karthus maybe? Call, what?

...Oh.

You got me good, lmao.
Haha glad you enjoyed, that was pretty much what I was going for =P I'm a bit of a sucker for trying to write stuff with twists ;)

Oh wow I did not expect that XD you kept the twist well-hidden but it was never obnoxious. Mysterious and just hilarious to read. Nicely done! 
Poor little guy. I'd totally buy him a drink. (But just this one. They can call me bias I don't care.)
Thanks! It was a lot of fun writing it while trying to keep it subtle and not give it away until the end =P Glad you enjoyed!
